      static java.lang.String httpPostWithHeader(java.lang.String url, java.lang.String postData, java.lang.String header)
      建议使用luasocket插件取代该方法, 更高效，更多的操作方式 自定义头部发送Post请求 头部格式: Content-Type:application/json;Content-Length:20 以分号分割多个头部信息, 冒号分割键值。

    • 字段详细资料

      • uiDevice

        public static android.support.test.uiautomator.UiDevice uiDevice
        UiDevice provides access to state information about the device. You can also use this class to simulate user actions on the device, such as pressing the d-pad or pressing the Home and Menu buttons.

      • context

        public static android.content.Context context

      • uiAutomation

                                      int y)
        Perform a click at arbitrary coordinates specified by the user

        y - coordinate
        返回:
        true if the click succeeded else false
        从以下版本开始:
        API Level 16

      • swipe

        public static java.lang.Boolean swipe(int startX,
                                      int startY,
                                      int endX,
                                      int endY,
                                      int steps)
        Performs a swipe from one coordinate to another using the number of steps to determine smoothness and speed. Each step execution is throttled to 5ms per step. So for a 100 steps, the swipe will take about 1/2 second to complete.
        参数:
        startX -
        startY -
        endX -
        endY -
        steps - is the number of move steps sent to the system
        返回:
        false if the operation fails or the coordinates are invalid
        从以下版本开始:
        API Level 16

      • drag

        public static java.lang.Boolean drag(int startX,
                                     int startY,
                                     int endX,
                                     int endY,
                                     int steps)
        Performs a swipe from one coordinate to another coordinate. You can control the smoothness and speed of the swipe by specifying the number of steps. Each step execution is throttled to 5 milliseconds per step, so for a 100 steps, the swipe will take around 0.5 seconds to complete.
        参数:
        startX - X-axis value for the starting coordinate
        startY - Y-axis value for the starting coordinate
        endX - X-axis value for the ending coordinate
        endY - Y-axis value for the ending coordinate
        steps - is the number of steps for the swipe action
        返回:
        true if swipe is performed, false if the operation fails or the coordinates are invalid
        从以下版本开始:
        API Level 18

        String name of activity

        Take a screenshot of current window and store it as PNG The screenshot is adjusted per screen rotation
        参数:

        返回:
        true if screen shot is created successfully, false otherwise

      • executeShellCommand

        public static java.lang.String executeShellCommand(java.lang.String cmd)
                                            throws java.io.IOException
        Executes a shell command using shell user identity, and return the standard output in string.

        Calling function with large amount of output will have memory impacts, and the function call will block if the command executed is blocking.

        Note: calling this function requires API level 21 or above

        参数:
        cmd - the command to run
        返回:
        the standard output of the command
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException
        从以下版本开始:
        API Level 21

      • screenOn

        public static java.lang.Boolean screenOn()
                                  throws android.os.RemoteException
        This method simulates pressing the power button if the screen is OFF else it does nothing if the screen is already ON. If the screen was OFF and it just got turned ON, this method will insert a 500ms delay to allow the device time to wake up and accept input.
        抛出:
        android.os.RemoteException
        从以下版本开始:
        API Level 16

      • screenOff

        public static java.lang.Boolean screenOff()
                                   throws android.os.RemoteException
        This method simply presses the power button if the screen is ON else it does nothing if the screen is already OFF.
        返回:
        true if successful, else return false
        抛出:
        android.os.RemoteException

        public static java.lang.Boolean clickByTextContain(java.lang.String text,
                                                   int index)

        参数:

        index - 如果找到多个相同内容的项，取第几个的索引，从0开始计算。

        参数:

        timeout - 超时时间
        返回:

      • setTextByTextContain

        public static java.lang.Boolean setTextByTextContain(java.lang.String text,
                                                     java.lang.String textContent,
                                                     int index)
                                              throws android.support.test.uiautomator.UiObjectNotFoundException
        通过包含匹配文本内容来设置文本框内容，文本即该组件上显示的内容，或者通过DDMS获取.
        参数:
        text - 包含匹配的文本内容
        textContent - 需设置的文本内容
        index - 如果找到多个相同内容的项，取第几个的索引，从0开始计算。
        返回:
        抛出:
        android.support.test.uiautomator.UiObjectNotFoundException

        抛出:

        抛出:

                             java.lang.String writestr)
                      throws java.io.IOException

      • findMultiColorInRegionFuzzy

        public static java.lang.String findMultiColorInRegionFuzzy(int oriPix,
                                                           java.lang.String otherPix,
                                                           int sim,
                                                           int startX,
                                                           int startY,
                                                           int endX,
                                                           int endY)
                                                    throws java.lang.NoSuchMethodException,
                                                           java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException,
                                                           java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                                                           java.lang.NoSuchFieldException
        Find the point by multiple pixels Example: findMultiColorInRegionFuzzy( 0xade1f5, "466|29|0x2cadf1,77|192|0x686868,78|193|0x1a1a1a", 90, 0, 0, 719, 1279)
        参数:
        oriPix - Original pixel
        otherPix - Other pixels description. Offset in original and value of pixel
        sim - Similarity of every pixel, value can be set from 0 to 100.
        startX - The start X coordinate of picture.
        startY - The start Y coordinate of picture.
        endX - The end X coordinate of picture.
        endY - The end Y coordinate of picture.
        返回:
        If find the point then return the point(String), else return "-1,-1".
        抛出:
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException
        java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        java.lang.NoSuchFieldException

      • log

        public static void log(java.lang.String file,
                       java.lang.String content)
                throws java.io.IOException
        以覆盖方式记录日志，日志生成的目录在/mnt/sdcard/GodHand/log/
        参数:
        file - 日志文件名,无需后缀名，自动扩展“.log”。
        content - 日志内容
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • httpGet

        public static java.lang.String httpGet(java.lang.String url,
                                       java.lang.String param)
        建议使用luasocket插件取代该方法, 更高效，更多的操作方式 向指定URL发送GET方法的请求
        参数:
        url - 发送请求的URL
        param - 请求参数，请求参数应该是 name1=value1&name2=value2 的形式。
        返回:
        URL 所代表远程资源的响应结果，如果请求发生错误返回 "" 空字符串

      • httpPost

        public static java.lang.String httpPost(java.lang.String url,
                                        java.lang.String param)
        建议使用luasocket插件取代该方法, 更高效，更多的操作方式 向指定 URL 发送POST方法的请求
        参数:
        url - 发送请求的 URL
        param - Post 内容
        返回:
        所代表远程资源的响应结果，如果请求发生错误返回 "" 空字符串

      • httpPostWithHeader

        public static java.lang.String httpPostWithHeader(java.lang.String url,
                                                  java.lang.String postData,
                                                  java.lang.String header)
        建议使用luasocket插件取代该方法, 更高效，更多的操作方式 自定义头部发送Post请求 头部格式: Content-Type:application/json;Content-Length:20 以分号分割多个头部信息, 冒号分割键值。
        参数:
        url - 发送请求的 URL
        postData - Post内容
        header - 以分号分割多个头部信息, 冒号分割键值。
        返回:
        所代表远程资源的响应结果，如果请求发生错误返回 "" 空字符串
